bs-bookshelf-tagerror-no-attribute-given: Error message when no variable for the "src" attribute was provided
bs-bookshelf-tagerror-article-title-not-:
Error message when the provided page title given in the "src" attribute does not exist.
* $1 - Provided page title
bs-bookshelf-tagerror-article-content-no:
Error message when the content of the provided page title given in the "src" attribute does contain invalid data
* $1 - Provided page title
bs-bookshelf-positive-integer-validation: Error message when the provided variable for the "height" or "width" attribute was not a positive integer.
bs-bookshelf-tagerror-attribute-float-no: Error message when the provided variable for the "float" attribute is not valid. Valid variables are "left" and "right"
bs-bookshelf-specialpage-title:
Title of books tab in left navigaion.
{{Identical|Books}}
bs-bookshelf-pref-SupressBookNS: Label for the checkbox in user preferences, when activated, namespace prefix of book pages in output is supressed
bs-bookshelf-pref-TitleDisplayText: Label for the checkbox in user preferences, when activated, display title from book source is used on pages
bs-bookshelf-pref-PrependPageTOCNumbers: Label for the checkbox in user preferences, when activated, article table of contents and headlines with book numberation are prepended.
bs-bookshelf-tag-next:
Short label for the button that shows the next page.
{{Identical|Next}}
bs-bookshelf-tag-prev:
Short label for the button that shows the previous page.
{{Identical|Previous}}
bs-bookshelf-tag-edit-book: Short label for the button that allows editing the book.
bs-bookshelf-personal-books-page-prefix: The wikipage name under which personal books reside. Parameter $1 is the user name
bs-bookshelf-add-to-book-label: Short label for the button, that adds an entry to a book.
bs-bookshelf-add-to-book-label-book:
Short label for the combobox that allows to select a book.
{{Identical|Book}}
bs-bookshelf-add-to-book-label-alias:
Short label for the text form input that allows to enter an alias.
{{Identical|Alias}}
bs-bookshelf-add-to-book-label-mod-bstag: Label for the checkbox that, if set, triggers the update of the "bookshelf" tag in the page and therefore creates a new revision doing so.
bs-bookshelf-add-to-book-added:
Text when the page was successfully added to the selected book.
* $1 - Selected book, the page was added to.
bs-bookshelf-add-to-book-mod-bstag: Text when the "bookshelf" tag of the page has been updated successfully and that the the page will be reloaded.
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-store-param-tempBoo:
{{doc-apihelp-param|bs-bookshelf-store|tempBooks}}
Describes the API parameter which provides temporary, clientside stored books to be reflected by the store
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-bookstore-param-nod:
{{doc-apihelp-param|bs-bookshelf-bookstore|node}}
Describes the API parameter which speficies a node for which a subchapter list should be provided.
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-bookstore-param-boo:
{{doc-apihelp-param|bs-bookshelf-bookstore|book}}
Describes the API parameter which specifies the book for which a chapter list should be provided.
bs-bookshelf-setting-path-feature:
Name for feature "book" used in BlueSpiceConfigManager.
{{Identical|Book}}
bs-bookshelf-empty-selection:
Error message if no pages have been selected when trying to add pages to a book.
{{Identical|None selected}}
bs-bookshelf-action-editbooksource-creat: Action label when page does not exist: editbooksource
bs-bookshelf-edit-title: Page title when editing a book
bs-bookshelf-error-invalid-type: Error message if given book type is invalid
bs-bookshelf-error-type-title-mismatch: Error message if title given does not match the given book type
bs-bookshelf-editor-no-title-provided: Error message when given given subpage as parameter on the [[Special:BookshelfBookUI]] specialpage is not a valid page
bs-bookshelf-grouping-template-type-user: Short label for the option "user" in the group selection combobox.
bs-bookshelf-grouping-template-type-ns_b:
Short label for the option "namespace" in the group selection combobox.
{{Identical|General books}}
bs-bookshelf-book-grid-title:
Title for the grid showing available books
{{identical|Book}}
bookshelf:
Special page name for [[Special:Bookshelf]] special page.
{{Identical|Bookshelf}}
bs-bookshelf-action-save-to-local-storag: Label for the action in batch dialog
